title: Cuffs and Linen
description: Amanda experiences a sexual awakening from the touch of steel on her wrists for the very first time. Sure, it is a dubious experience, but she knows that a sleeping beast has been awakened within her. Best of all, she knows that she can use her newfound sexual liberation to control her live-in boyfriend, Brian, who could use all the controlling she can dish out.For mature audiences only. Do not download if you are under 18.
author: Alexandra Rowan
